Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! It's me, AstroGamer, and today, I have a new idea for a gas giant! It's kinda based on Nemesis, the Sun's evil twin, but only a little. Here she is!

![BHGC4eD.png](http://i.imgur.com/BHGC4eD.png)

Yeah, she is a monster of a yolk.

Now, as the description says, this beauty has moons!

![ujj23ir.png](http://i.imgur.com/ujj23ir.png)

Information soon. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Just worth noting that you can't invent an SOI. It has to be based upon the gravity of the parent and child bodies. It looks like you just drew them.

> 
> Just worth noting that you can't invent an SOI. It has to be based upon the gravity of the parent and child bodies. It looks like you just drew them.

Of course I drew them. How the hell would I be able to mod those into the game? '-'

> 
> Of course I drew them. How the hell would I be able to mod those into the game? '-'

You could use Kopernicus, it's easy if you don't whine, moan, and groan about it as planet pack makers such as myself will help you.
Hmmmh, I quite like the idea of a dead dwarf as the extra-joolian gas giant. One tip, though: Venella should be in a resonant orbit with both Jool and Eeloo so that it won't spoil their orbits.

> 
> You could use Kopernicus, it's easy if you don't whine, moan, and groan about it as planet pack makers such as myself will help you.

That could be cool. I think I'll give it a go. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) But what about licences and stuff?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Hmmmh, I quite like the idea of a dead dwarf as the extra-joolian gas giant. One tip, though: Venella should be in a resonant orbit with both Jool and Eeloo so that it won't spoil their orbits.

Well, I think Jool if fine, but my theory is that when Vennela comes up to Eeloo, it's at periapps. You're most likely right, though. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> That could be cool. I think I'll give it a go. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) But what about licences and stuff?
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Well, I think Jool if fine, but my theory is that when Vennela comes up to Eeloo, it's at periapps. You're most likely right, though. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I'd do GNU GPL v3.

> 
> I'd do GNU GPL v3.

I already do not know what that is. The licence?

GNU GPL v3 IS a license. But, I'd recommend Creative Commons.

Also, are Ethyal and Crak in a binary orbit around each other? And where's Sruthain?

> 
> GNU GPL v3 IS a license. But, I'd recommend Creative Commons.
> Also, are Ethyal and Crak in a binary orbit around each other? And where's Sruthain?

Oh, ok.

Yes. :3 And SruthÃƒÂ¡in is after Aurora.
